ancillary_box.html:
This file should not be uploaded as a standard data file
The data file only includes geographic levels that are going to be ignored by EES, see our guidance on uploading ancillary files for more information on how to upload as an ancillary file instead of via the normal data route.

passed_box.html:
All the screener checks passed!
Your files can now be uploaded to Explore Education Statistics, see our guidance on using EES for more information.

progress_stage.alt: Made it to the full screening checks and passed
